amendment.description: Amendment allows charter schools to use grant funds for teacher preparation, professional development, and improving school conditions. Amendment also ensures that charter schools expand outreach to low-income and underserved populations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 113-158 to allow charter schools to use grant funds for teacher preparation, professional development, and improving school conditions. The amendment ensures that charter schools expand outreach to low-income and underserved populations.
